name: chroma-rio
description: A Sass tool for generating color palettes based on the RGB color wheel.

scripts.bootstrap532: cd vendor/twbs/bootstrap/5.3.2 && npm i && npm run dist
scripts.bootstrap533: cd vendor/twbs/bootstrap/5.3.3 && npm i && npm run dist
scripts.build: npm run bootstrap532 && npm run bootstrap533 && npm run gulp-dist

author: Machado dos Santos
